api_list.name: get individual spoon blog sites
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com/news/Wood-Tamer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com/news/{blogid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "spoon-blogs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
